name: The Loop (PhillSerrazina)
description:
You have entered the loop! You're trapped, but please take your time to relax and enjoy the ride!

This was a game made in 48h for the Ludum Dare 47 Game Jam, where the theme was "Stuck in a Loop!"

Use WASD to move, SHIFT to sprint and E to interact with things. Use your wits to beat the Loop Master's puzzles and escape!
